title: Low Interest Rates and the Financial System
content: Note:  Net interest margin is equal to net interest income divided by  average earning assets. CCAR is Comprehensive Capital Analysis and Review.  Source:  Federal Reserve Board, Form FR Y-9C, Consolidated Financial Statements for Holding Companies.  Note:  Return on assets is equal to net income divided by  average assets. CCAR is Comprehensive Capital Analysis and Review.  Source:  Federal Reserve Board, Form FR Y-9C, Consolidated Financial Statements for Holding Companies.  1.5  2  2.5  3  3.5  4  4.5  5  5.5  2001 2004 2007 2010 2013 2016  Figure 4a:  Net Interest Margins  CCAR Banks  Other Banks  Percent of interest- earning assets  (s.a.a.r)  -4  -3  -2  -1  0  1  2  2001 2004 2007 2010 2013 2016  Figure 4b:  Return on Assets  CCAR Banks  Other Banks  Percent of assets (s.a.a.r)
